channel.title: AGU on Yasunori SAWAKI
channel.description: Recent content in AGU on Yasunori SAWAKI

item.title: AGU25@New Orleans
item.description: I attended AGU25 (American Geophysical Union Annual Meeting) held at New Orleans, LA, in 15â€“19 December 2025. A master student in our lab also presented a poster.

item.title: AGU24 in Washington D.C.
item.description: I participated in American Geophysics Union Annual Meeting 2024 held in Washington D.C. during 9–13 December 2024 and gave an oral talk about the fault geometry of the 2024 Mw 7.5 Noto Peninsula Earthquake. Interactions with researchers and students ignited my passion for further research.

item.title: AGU Fall Meeting 2023 at San Francisco
item.description: I participated in the AGU Fall Meeting 2023 held at San Francisco during December 11–15. We had a good poster presentation with lively discussions with worldwide researchers. I can’t wait the next opportunity to interact with you all!
